name: Young Spells
description:
'Young Spells' is part fiction, part memoir, part game.  It is about two teen girls casting a spell in their bedroom, trying to catch a glimpse of what their future selves might be like. They have the candles, and the herbs and the salt, they've marked out their circle with an old skipping rope but they still need more ingredients. Explore the timeline of a young girl's teenagehood to gather the ingredients you'll need to cast the spell. 

This game was using the free opensource software Twine.  It is my first game, and is still a work in progress, so any constructive feedback you have would be greatly appreciated.
